devdoc.details: Owner can update the implementation address for proxy deployments

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

params.name: Name of the vault token
params.vault: Address of the newly created vault proxy

acceptOwnership().details: The new owner accepts the ownership transfer.

params.vaultImplementation_: Address of the YieldVault implementation contract (for proxy deployments)

params.asset_: Address of the underlying asset (ERC20 token)
params.name_: Name of the vault token (e.g., "Vesper vault USDC")
params.owner_: Address that will own the created vault

returns.vault: Address of the newly created vault

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner. Setting `newOwner` to the zero address is allowed; this can be used to cancel an initiated ownership transfer.

params.newImplementation_: Address of the new YieldVault implementation contract

devdoc.title: YieldVaultFactory

ImplementationUpdated(address,address).notice: Emitted when the implementation address is updated

UpgradableVaultCreated(address,string,st.notice: Emitted when a new upgradable vault is created

constructor.notice: Constructor sets the YieldVault implementation address and initial owner

vaultImplementation().notice: Address of the YieldVault implementation contract (for proxy deployments)

userdoc.notice: Factory contract for creating YieldVault instances with owner controls
